channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Netflixの広告担当プレジデント、エイミー・ラインハードによると、広告ティアのMAUは全世界で2,300万人以上、広告ティアを利用している顧客の85％が1日2時間以上ストリーミングを利用しているとのこと（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Netflix President of Advertising Amy Reinhard says its ad tier has 23M+ MAUs globally, and 85% of customers on the ad tier are streaming for 2+ hours per day  —  Netflix is seeing strong growth of its advertising-based plan, having recently eclipsed 23 million global monthly active users, president of advertising Amy Reinhard said.

item.title: 情報筋：OpenAIはCNNおよびFox Corp.とテキスト、ビデオ、画像コンテンツのライセンス交渉中。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: OpenAI is in talks with CNN and Fox Corp. to license text, video, and image content; Time says it “is in discussions with OpenAI” about an agreement  —  - Startup has said it's in discussions with dozens of publishers  — Negotiations come as OpenAI faces New York Times lawsuit

item.title: メモアマゾン・スタジオの責任者ジェニファー・サルケが、最近のレイオフはアマゾン・スタジオとMGMの劇場配給チームを統合する計画の一環だと語った（Deadline）。
item.description:
Deadline:
Memo: Amazon Studios Head Jennifer Salke says recent layoffs were part of its plan to consolidate the Amazon Studios and MGM theatrical distribution teams  —  EXCLUSIVE: Earlier this morning, Amazon revealed that it was laying off several hundred employees across Prime Video and Amazon Studios as part of a review of its business.

item.title: 情報源WPPは市場調査事業カンターの株式40％から撤退する選択肢を検討中、WPPは2019年にカンターの60％をバイアウト会社ベイン・キャピタルに売却（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: WPP is considering options to exit its 40% stake in market-research business Kantar; WPP sold 60% of Kantar to buyout firm Bain Capital in 2019  —  - Kantar could be valued about £7 billion in a transaction  — WPP sold a majority stake in Kantar to PE firm Bain in 2019

item.title: 情報筋Skydanceの後援者はNational Amusementsへの全額現金での入札を協議中、成功すればパラマウントとSkydanceの合併という2つ目の取引を追求する（Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Skydance backers are discussing an all-cash bid for National Amusements; if successful, they would pursue a second deal to merge Paramount and Skydance  —  CEO Ellison, his father, Larry, and other investors are in talks to buy Redstone's stake in National Amusements, Paramount's parent

item.title: ドナルド・トランプは本日、約2年ぶりにフォックス・ニュースの生インタビューに登場する。情報筋によると、トランプはフォックスがドミニオンとの和解を誤ったと考えているようだ。
item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
Donald Trump will appear in his first live Fox News interview in nearly two years later today; sources say Trump thinks Fox erred in settling with Dominion  —  A town hall in Iowa on Wednesday is the network's first live interview with the former president in nearly two years, the latest twist in a long-running drama.

item.title: Sensor Tower：Netflix Gamesのダウンロード数は2023年にApp StoreとGoogle Play全体で前年比180%増の8,120万に、Q4はダウンロード数の53%を占める（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Sensor Tower: Netflix Games downloads rose 180% YoY to 81.2M globally across the App Store and Google Play in 2023, with Q4 accounting for 53% of downloads  —  Just over two years ago, Netflix announced it would enter a new business: gaming.  Amid a mobile gaming market dominated by free …

item.title: Luminateの2023年レポート：世界の音楽業界は2023年に4Tストリームを突破、新記録で前年比34%増、米国ではテイラー・スウィフトが78ストリームに1ストリームを占める（Maria Sherman/Associated Press）
item.description:
Maria Sherman / Associated Press:
Luminate's 2023 report: the global music industry passed 4T streams in 2023, a new record and up 34% YoY; Taylor Swift accounted for one in every 78 US streams  —  Listened to more music last year?  You're not alone.  —  The global music industry surpassed 4 trillion streams in 2023 …

item.title: Twitchのダン・クランシーCEO、2023年3月の人員削減後、500人以上（従業員の〜35%）を削減する計画を確認、従業員は事業規模に対して過剰だったと語る（The Verge
item.description:
The Verge:
Twitch CEO Dan Clancy confirms plans to cut 500+ jobs, or ~35% of its staff, and says its workforce was oversized for its business' size, after March 2023 cuts  —  Twitch is laying off more than 500 employees, Twitch CEO Dan Clancy announced this morning, reportedly accounting for around 35 percent of its staff.

item.title: 英国映画協会は、2月16日から4年間の任期で、欧州のApple TV+のクリエイティブ・ディレクターであるジェイ・ハント氏を会長に任命した（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
The British Film Institute names Jay Hunt, the creative director for Apple TV+ in Europe, as its chair for a four-year term starting on Feburary 16  —  She serves as creative director for Apple TV+ in Europe.  —  Jay Hunt, the creative director for Apple TV+ in Europe …

item.title: メモ：Amazon Studiosのマイク・ホプキンスSVPが、Prime VideoとMGM Studiosの「数百の役割」を削減すると発表。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Memo: Amazon Studios SVP Mike Hopkins says the company would cut “several hundred roles” in its Prime Video and MGM Studios units; both had cuts in early 2023  —  Mike Hopkins announced the cuts Wednesday.  —  Amazon is cutting hundreds of jobs in its Prime Video and MGM Studios division.

item.title: エクアドル大統領が非常事態宣言を発令した後、武装集団が生放送中のエクアドルのTC Televisiónを襲撃。
item.description:
The Guardian:
An armed gang stormed Ecuador's TC Televisión during a live broadcast, after Ecuador's president declared a state of emergency; all the gunmen were arrested  —  Gangsters unleashed wave of terror following move by President Daniel Noboa in response to gang leader's prison escape

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙の幹部に宛てた書簡で、トップ記者たちが、同紙の〜10％の人員削減の一環である調査部門の削減について懸念を表明している（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）。
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
In a letter to Washington Post executives, top reporters raise concerns about the gutting of the research department as part of the paper's ~10% staff cuts  —  Top reporters have urged executive editor Sally Buzbee and publisher Will Lewis to address the gutted research department, a casualty of the paper's roughly 10% staff reduction.

item.title: スウェーデンのストリーミングサービス「ヴィアプレイ」、資本再編の承認を得て破産を回避 カナル＋とチェコのPE企業PPFが58.6％の株式を取得（Anton Wilen/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Anton Wilen / Bloomberg:
Swedish streaming service Viaplay avoids bankruptcy after getting approval to recapitalize, as part of which Canal+ and Czech PE firm PPF will get a 58.6% stake  —  Swedish streaming service Viaplay Group AB has stepped back from the brink of bankruptcy after getting approval for a rescue plan …

item.title: ブラジルのファクトチェック機関Aos FatosのボットFátimaGPTの様子。LLMとアーカイブをペアにして、WhatsApp、Telegram、ウェブ上の質問に答える（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
A look at Brazilian fact-checking org Aos Fatos' bot FátimaGPT, which pairs an LLM with its archives to answer questions on WhatsApp, Telegram, and the web  —  “Instead of giving a list of URLs that the user can access — which requires more work for the user — we can answer the question they asked."
